name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add Sender Email Address to Outlook

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays the sender email addresses of the mail in your Inbox, Deleted, Archive, and Junk folders in Outlook Web.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension appends the email sender's address next to their name on Outlook Web. If the email address is truncated, hover over the sender's name to view the full address.


GitHub:
github.com/charleskimbac/Add-Sender-Email-Address-to-Outlook
